article.headline: Wofford 73, Navy 62
article.story: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- Noah Dahlman scored 13 points and Corey Godzinski 12 as Wofford defeated Navy 73-62 on Saturday. The Terriers (5-6) outscored Navy 23-12 over the final 8:22 after the Midshipmen (4-7) had pulled into a 50-50 tie on a 3-pointer by Jordan Sugars, who led all scorers with 21 points. A layup and free throw by Terry Martin put Wofford ahead 53-50. Mark Veazey's layup for Navy cut it to 53-52, but Brad Loesing hit a 3-pointer for Wofford and Dahlman added a pair of layups to make it 60-52. Navy led by as much as six points, 18-12, in the first half, but Wofford came back behind Godzinski, who scored 10 of his points in the opening half. The Terriers took a 32-26 lead into halftime. Loesing added 10 points for Wofford and Tim Johnson had a team-high eight rebounds. Chris Harris scored 11 points for Navy.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
